disclaimerForgotPassword: When you used this forgot password option, your wallet will sync from the block height $daemonHeight$. This is the block height at which your wallet was created
remoteNoteToAllTransactions: Wallet will connect to a remote node to make all transactions
hintReceiveBDX: Enter amount to generate a QR and receive BDX
joinSocialGroupAfterInvitationConfirmati: Are you sure you want to join the $roomName$ social group?
emptyChatScreen:
Much empty. Such wow.

Get some friends to BChat!
youGotKickedFromGroup: You were removed from the group.
debugLogExplanation: This log will be saved to your desktop.
oneNonImageAtATimeToast: Sorry, there is a limit of one non-image attachment per message
cannotMixImageAndNonImageAttachments: Sorry, you cannot mix images with other file types in one message
maximumAttachments: Maximum number of attachments reached. Please send remaining attachments in a separate message.
fileSizeWarning: Attachment exceeds size limits for the type of message you're sending.
unableToLoadAttachment: Sorry, there was an error setting your attachment.
audioPermissionNeeded: You can enable microphone access permission in the Privacy Settings
localDeamonheadetcntent: Wallet will connect to a local node to make all transactions
cannotUpdateDetail: BChat Desktop failed to update, but there is a new version available. Please go to https://bchat.beldex.io/ and install the new version manually, then either contact support or file a bug about this problem.
messageDeletionForbidden: You don’t have permission to delete others’ messages
deleteMessagesQuestion: This will permanently delete the  selected $count$ messages.
deleteMessageQuestion: This will permanently delete the  selected messages.
deleteConversationConfirmation: Permanently delete the messages in this conversation?
deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently erase all your account data. Do you wish to clear data on this device or completely earse your account?
deleteContactConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
quoteThumbnailAlt: Thumbnail of image from quoted message
videoAttachmentAlt: Screenshot of video attached to message
imageCaptionIconAlt: Icon showing that this image has a caption
linkPreviewDescription: Previews are supported for imgur, Instagram, Pinterest, Reddit, and YouTube links
linkPreviewsConfirmMessage: Enabling link previews will minimize your metadata protection. Do you still want to proceed?.
mediaPermissionsDescription: Enabling this option will allow access to your microphone.
spellCheckDescription: Checks the spelling of messages that you type into the compose pane
spellCheckDirty: You must restart BChat to apply your new settings
readReceiptSettingDescription: Enabling read receipts will allow you to see if your messages have been read (applied to all chats).
typingIndicatorsSettingDescription: Enabling this option will allow the recipient to see that a message is being typed (applied to all chats).
pruneSettingDescription: Enabling this option will cut back messages that are older than 6 months.
pruningSocialgroupDialogMessage: Pruning old social group messages improves performance. Enable pruning for social group messages older than 6 months?
pruningSocialgroupDialogSubMessage: You can change this setting in the BChat settings menu
notificationSettingsDialog: When messages arrive, display notifications that reveal...
messageBodyMissing: Please enter a text or attach files to send.
unblockToSend: Unblock this contact to send a message.
unblockGroupToSend: This group is blocked. Unlock it if you would like to send a message.
youChangedTheTimer: You set the disappearing message timer to $time$
theyChangedTheTimer: $name$ activated disappearing messages. Messages will now disappear after $time$
disabledDisappearingMessages: Disappearing messages have been disabled by $name$.
youDisabledDisappearingMessages: Disappearing messages have been disabled by you.
shareBchatIdDiscription: Enter your friend's BChat ID to connect with them.
invalidNumberError: Invalid BChat ID or BNS Name
autoUpdateSettingDescription: Enabling this will let BChat automatically check updates and notify you.
autoUpdateNewVersionMessage: There is a new version of BChat available.
autoUpdateNewVersionInstructions: Press Restart BChat to apply the updates.
autoUpdateDownloadInstructions: Would you like to download the update?
joinedTheGroup: Welcome $name$. This is your secret party.
leaveGroupConfirmation: Are you sure you want to leave,$name$?
leaveGroupConfirmationAdmin: Because you are the creator of this group. it will be deleted for everyone. This cannot be undone
cannotRemoveCreatorFromGroupDesc: You cannot remove this user as they are the creator of the group.
noContactsForGroup: You don't have any contacts yet
failedToAddAsModerator: Failed to add user as moderator
failedToRemoveFromModerator: Failed to remove user from the moderator list
setAccountPasswordDescription: Enabling this will mandate you to unlock BChat using your account password every time you launch the app. This does not affect notifications.
removeAccountPasswordDescription: Remove the password associated with your account
oldPasswordAndNewPasswordSame: Please enter a password that you have not used before.
recoveryPhraseSavePromptMain: Your recovery phrase is the master key to your BChat ID — you can use it to restore your BChat ID if you lose access to your device. Store your recovery phrase in a safe place, and don't give it to anyone.
maxPasswordAttempts: Invalid Password. Would you like to reset the database?
typeInOldPassword: Please type in your old password
changePasswordInvalid: The old password you entered is incorrect
changePasswordToastDescription: Your password has been changed Successfully!. Please keep it safe.
publicChatExists: You are already connected to this social group
passwordLengthError: Password must be between 4 and 26 characters long
passwordCharacterError: Password must only contain letters, numbers and symbols
noContactsToAdd: You currently don't have any contacts.
noMembersInThisGroup: No other members in this group
onlyAdminCanRemoveMembersDesc: Only the creator of the group can remove users
startInTrayDescription: After closing the window, BChat runs in the background
yourUniqueBchatID: Say hello to your BChat ID
Your BChat ID is the unique address people can use to contact you on BChat. With no connection to your real identity, your BChat ID is totally anonymous and private by design.
saveYourRecoveryPhrase: Save your recovery seed! Only your recovery seed can be used to recover your account on another device.
copyToContinueRecovery: Copy the recovery seed to continue.
yourBchatName: Your BChat ID is like your username. You can share it with your friends to begin a conversation.
beldexAddressConnection: Your BChat address is connected to your BChat ID. You can use this address to receive BDX.
removeResidueMembers: Clicking ok will also remove those members as they left the group.
enterBchatIDOfRecipient: Enter BChat ID or BNS name of recipient
Users can share their BChat ID by going into their account settings and tapping "Share BChat ID", or by sharing their QR code.
invalidGroupNameTooLong: Please enter a shorter group name
pickSecretGroupMember: Please pick at least 1 group member
secretGroupMaxSize: A secret group cannot have more than 100 members
secretGroupInviteFailMessage: Unable to successfully invite a group member
secretGroupInviteFailMessagePlural: Unable to successfully invite all group members
onionPathIndicatorDescription: BChat masks your IP by routing your messages through the masternodes on the Beldex decentralized network. Your messages are currently being routed through nodes in the following countries:
linkVisitWarningTitle: Open this link in your browser?
linkVisitWarningMessage: Are you sure you want to open $url$ in your browser?
trustThisContactDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to download media sent by $name$?
sendRecoveryPhraseMessage: You are attempting to send your recovery phrase which can be used to access your account. Are you sure you want to send this message?
dialogClearAllDataDeletionFailedDesc: Data not deleted with an unknown error. Do you want to delete data from just this device?
dialogClearAllDataDeletionFailedTitleQue: Do you want to delete data from just this device?
dialogClearAllDataDeletionFailedMultiple: Data not deleted by those Master Nodes: $snodes$
dialogClearAllDataDeletionQuestion: Would you like to clear only this device, or delete your entire account?
areYouSureDeleteDeviceOnly: Are you sure you want to delete your device data only?
areYouSureDeleteEntireAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your entire account, including the network data?
recoveryPhraseRevealMessage: Secure your account by saving your recovery phrase. Reveal your recovery phrase then store it safely to secure it.
hideRequestBannerDescription: Enabling this option will hide the message request prompt. It reappears only when you receive a new message.
cameraPermissionNeeded: Allow 'Voice & Video Calls' under privacy settings to make a call.
callMissedCausePermission: Call missed from '$name$' because you need to enable the 'Voice and video calls' permission in the Privacy Settings.
callMissedNotApproved: Call missed from '$name$' as you haven't approved this conversation yet. Send a message to them first.
callMediaPermissionsDescription: Enabling this option will allow you to receive voice and video calls.
callMediaPermissionsDialogContent: The current implementation of voice/video calls will expose your IP address to the Beldex servers and the calling/called user.
trimDatabaseDescription: Reduces your message database size to your last 10,000 messages.
trimDatabaseConfirmationBody: Are you sure you want to delete your $deleteAmount$ oldest received messages?
messageRequestPending: Your message request is currently pending
messageRequestAccepted: Your message request has been accepted
messageRequestAcceptedOursNoName: You have accepted the message request
declineRequestMessage: Are you sure you want to decline this message request?
respondingToRequestWarning: Replying to their message will accept their message request and displays your BChat ID to them.
noMediaUntilApproved: You cannot send attachments until the conversation is approved
mustBeApproved: This conversation must be accepted to use this feature
youHaveANewFriendRequest: You have a new friend request
clearAllConfirmationBody: Do you want to erase all message requests?
rescanWalletDiscription: You can rescan your wallet to sync again
emptyTransactionDiscription: After your first transaction, you will be able to view it here.
